description: Query the list of pending delete domains. (the domains which are going to be released soon)
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Filter by a list of keywords
Keyword concatenation. Can be AND or OR
Specify which part of the domain name the keyword has to match. Can be BEGIN, END or ANY
Filter by length of domain name (range: 1-20)
Filter by score of domain names (range: 1-10)

Filter by domain name criteria, must be one of the following:NOHYPHENS show only domain names with no hyphensNONUMBERS: show only domain names which don't contain any numbersNOIDNS don't show any IDNs
Parameter by which the output will sorted.Must be one of the following: NAME, DELETIONDAY, FINALIZATIONDATE, SCORE, NAMEDESC, DELETIONDAYDESC, FINALIZATIONDATEDESC, SCOREDESC or RANDOM
paramaters.Type: NAME, DELETIONDAY, FINALIZATIONDATE, SCORE, NAMEDESC, DELETIONDAYDESC, FINALIZATIONDATEDESC, SCOREDESC, RANDOM or NULL

paramaters.Definition: Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Index of the first entry to be returned
Regular expression to match label. For example, the following matches labels which consist of digits only: REGEXP = ^[0-9]+$
